item.description:
All proceeds will benefit The Premier’s Flood Disaster Relief Appeal in Queensland and be directed to the Queensland Relief Appeal. The Australian Red Cross will manage the distribution of the donated funds on behalf of the Queensland Government.

All attendees will need to register and pay prior to the event.  Please follow the link the American Australian Association website for full registration and payment details: http://www.americanaustralian.org/en/cev/reg/703/
item.why: The Boston Aussies request your help raising funds for the victims of the Australian floods. Please join us for a wine reception and silent auction complete with live performances by Australian musicians.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Australian Flood Relief Fundraiser
